name: The Dream Boutique: a 3D dream journal [prototype]
name_original: The Dream Boutique: a 3D dream journal [prototype]
description:
The Dream Boutique is an interactive 3d dream journal/visual novel based on dream journal entries recorded between January 2013 - February 2021.

Inspired by Georges Perec's La Boutique Obscure: 124 Dreams, and games such as LSD Dream Emulator and Hypnagogia, The Dream Boutique is an exploration of the individual's unconscious.

Over 30 short dreams are included, with several dreams divided into miniature sections.

The game is developed in Unity with the Fungus extension. This is an unfinished prototype that may or may not be finished later, depending on future plans.

This project is considered as satire by the author and was edited with a mature audience in mind. Please use your best judgment.

Thanks for reading and please leave any criticisms below!
